files.patch:
@@ -272,0 +272,2 @@

+    TAR_TYPE="busybox"
@@ -283,1 +285,1 @@

+    # that need to be archived or extracted
@@ -286,0 +288,3 @@

+    TAR_INCLUDE_PARAM="T"
+    TAR_SUPPORTS_TRANSFORM="false"
